Source code for maxaimodel.spark.recommendation.spark_als

import json
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import itertools
from copy import deepcopy

from maxaibase.model.spark.spark_recommender import SparkRecommenderBaseModel
from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory
import pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T

from pyspark.ml.recommendation import ALS,ALSModel
from pyspark.ml.evaluation import RegressionEvaluator



[docs]@ModelFactory.register_model("SparkAlsRecommender")
class SparkAlsRecommender(SparkRecommenderBaseModel):
    def __init__(self, 
                 user_col,
                 item_col, 
                 rating_col,  
                 params,
                 param_grid,
                 evaluator_metric = 'rmse'):
        
        self.user_col = user_col
        self.item_col = item_col
        self.rating_col = rating_col
        self.params = params
        self.param_grid = param_grid
        self.evaluator_metric = evaluator_metric

        self.build()
        

[docs]    def build(self):
        self.model = ALS(userCol=self.user_col,itemCol=self.item_col,ratingCol=self.rating_col, **self.params)

        

[docs]    def optimise_model_without_cross_validator(self, train=None, test=None, tuning=None):
                
        if tuning:
            finalModel = None
            finalRank  = 0
            finalRegul = float(0)
            finalIter  = -1
            finalDist   = float(300)
            finalAlpha = float(0)
            
            ranks_default  = [5,10,15,20]
            reguls_default = [0.1, 1,10]
            iters_default  = [5,10,20]
            alpha_default = [10, 20, 40]
            
            if self.param_grid.get('rank'):
                rank_list = self.param_grid.get('rank')
            else:
                rank_list = ranks_default
            
            if self.param_grid.get('reg'):
                reg_list = self.param_grid.get('reg')
            else:
                reg_list = reguls_default
                
            if self.param_grid.get('iters'):
                iter_list = self.param_grid.get('iters')
            else:
                iter_list = iters_default
            
            if self.param_grid.get('alpha'):
                alpha_list = self.param_grid.get('alpha')
            else:
                alpha_list = alpha_default
                
            if self.param_grid.get('implicitPrefs'):
                implicit_pref = self.param_grid.get('implicitPrefs')
            else:
                implicit_pref = False
            
            if self.param_grid.get('nonnegative'):
                nonnegative = self.param_grid.get('nonnegative')
            else:
                nonnegative = False
            
            #[START train_model]
            for cRank, cRegul, cIter, cAlpha in itertools.product(rank_list, reg_list, iter_list, alpha_list):
                als = ALS(maxIter=cIter, regParam=cRegul, rank=cRank, alpha=cAlpha, userCol = self.user_col, itemCol = self.item_col,
                     ratingCol = self.rating_col,implicitPrefs=implicit_pref, nonnegative=nonnegative)
                model = als.fit(train)
                predictions = model.transform(test)
                new_pred = predictions.filter(F.col('prediction') != np.nan)
                evaluator = RegressionEvaluator(metricName=self.evaluator_metric,labelCol=self.rating_col, predictionCol='prediction')
                rmse = evaluator.evaluate(new_pred)
                if rmse < finalDist:
                    print(cIter, cRank,cAlpha,cRegul)
                    print("Best so far:%f" % rmse)
                    finalModel = model
                    finalRank  = cRank
                    finalRegul = cRegul
                    finalIter  = cIter
                    finalDist  = rmse
                    finalAlpha  = cAlpha 
            #[END train_model]

            print("Rank %i" % finalRank) 
            print("Regul %f" % finalRegul) 
            print("Iter %i" % finalIter)  
            print("Dist %f" % finalDist) 
            print("Alpha %f" % finalAlpha)
            tuned_params = {'finalRank':finalRank, 'finalRegul':finalRegul,'finalIter':finalIter,'finalAlpha':finalAlpha}
            return tuned_params

        else:
            self.model = self.model.fit(self.data)

        

[docs]    def save(self, path):
        self.model.write().overwrite().save(path)



[docs]    def load(self, path):
        self.model = ALSModel.load(path)
